// TODO: The following should eventually be sourced and generated
//       from the main tests within the PDSL
const _pdslHelpers = require("pdsl/helpers");

const assert = require("assert");

assert.strictEqual(_pdslHelpers.val(_pdslHelpers.not(_pdslHelpers.or(_pdslHelpers.val(null), _pdslHelpers.val(undefined))))(1), true);
assert.strictEqual(_pdslHelpers.val(_pdslHelpers.obj("name"))({
  name: "foo"
}), true);
assert.strictEqual(_pdslHelpers.val(true)(true), true);
assert.strictEqual(_pdslHelpers.val(_pdslHelpers.obj(_pdslHelpers.entry("name", _pdslHelpers.pred(a => a.length > 10))))({
  name: "12345678901"
}), true);
assert.strictEqual(_pdslHelpers.val(_pdslHelpers.extant)(1), true);
assert.strictEqual(_pdslHelpers.val(_pdslHelpers.extant)(null), false);
assert.strictEqual(_pdslHelpers.val(_pdslHelpers.and(_pdslHelpers.arrTypeMatch(_pdslHelpers.prim(Number)), _pdslHelpers.arrLen(5)))([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]), true);
assert.strictEqual(_pdslHelpers.val(_pdslHelpers.regx(_pdslHelpers.Email))("email@example.com"), true);
